# Importation des donn√©es

```{r}
data <- read.csv("volcano.csv",sep = ";")
summary(data)
dataquanti <- data[,c(1,7:9,13,15:19)]
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
value <- as.data.frame(table(data$Name))
# Stacked
ggplot(data, aes(x=Year)) + 
    geom_bar()

ggplot(data, aes(x=Year,fill = Name)) + 
    geom_bar()

ggplot(data, aes(x=Year,fill = Country)) + 
    geom_bar()

ggplot(data, aes(x=Year,fill = Type)) + 
    geom_bar()
```
==> ridgeline

```{r}
library(ggridges)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
library(hrbrthemes)
```

```{r}
dataquanti[is.na(dataquanti)] <- 0
cor(dataquanti)
ggcorr(dataquanti)
```

```{r}
cormat <- round(cor(dataquanti),2)
head(cormat)
library(reshape2)
melted_cormat <- melt(cormat)
head(melted_cormat)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = melted_cormat, aes(x=Var1, y=Var2, fill=value)) + 
  geom_tile()
```
